summary: Innovative AI-powered telemedicine approaches for HIV prevention in low- and middle-income countries integrate AI-driven risk prediction models, chatbots, and virtual counselors to provide stigma-free education and personalized support, enable PrEP initiation and management via video consultations and app-based self-screening, optimize medication supply forecasting, and expand access through pharmacies and community points, collectively enhancing reach, efficiency, and sustainability even in resource-constrained settings.
